incoming_message.text: URGENT: Your SBI account has been compromised. Your account will be blocked in 2 hours. Share your account number and OTP immediately to verify your identity.

agent_response.reply: This seems unusual... Can you provide some verification of your identity?

incoming_message.text: I’m a senior officer from SBI’s fraud team; my reference number is 1234567890123456, email scammer.fraud@fakebank, call +91-9876543210 – please send the OTP now to verify your account.

agent_response.reply: Can you explain why you need my banking details? I've heard about scams and want to be careful.

incoming_message.text: To protect your account we must verify it immediately – please send the OTP you just received and confirm your account number 1234567890123456 now, otherwise the block will be applied.

agent_response.reply: I need to document this... What's your company registration number and official contact number?

incoming_message.text: Our registration number is RBI-2021-XYZ and you can call us at +91-9876543210, but we still need the OTP you received to secure your account right now.

agent_response.reply: Can you send me your payment link or UPI? My bank requires recipient verification first.

incoming_message.text: Here is the UPI ID: scammer.fraud@fakebank. Send the OTP you just received right away so we can verify and secure your account before it gets blocked.

agent_response.reply: I need your UPI ID or bank account immediately to complete this. The app is timing out!

incoming_message.text: Here is the UPI ID: scammer.fraud@fakebank. Send the OTP you just received right now to confirm and prevent your account from being blocked.

agent_response.reply: I need your UPI ID or bank account immediately to complete this... The app is timing out!

incoming_message.text: Your account will be locked in minutes; send the OTP you just received now to confirm the transfer to 1234567890123456.

agent_response.reply: I'm at the payment screen but it's asking me to verify the recipient... What's your registered mobile number with the bank?

incoming_message.text: Our registered number is +91-9876543210; please send the OTP you just received right away so we can finish the verification before your account is locked.

agent_response.reply: I'm at the payment screen but it's asking me to verify the recipient. What's your registered mobile number with the bank?

incoming_message.text: I already gave you the number: +91-9876543210. Please send the OTP you just received now so we can complete the transfer to 1234567890123456 before your account is locked.

agent_response.reply: The payment form is asking for beneficiary UPI ID. What should I enter there? Can you share yours?

incoming_message.text: Enter the UPI ID scammer.fraud@fakebank and send the OTP you just received immediately before your account gets locked.

agent_response.reply: I'm ready to proceed but my bank is asking for recipient details... Can you provide your bank account number and IFSC code?
